main

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Block
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Block_Water

    public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    gary, logun, alex

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Block()
      This constructor sets all values to a default of 0.
      Block(int wid, Block_Water block)
      This constructor creates a block of a certain wid with the background and lighting of a water block.
      Block(int wid, Block block)
      This constructor creates a block of a certain wid with the background and lighting of another block.
      Block(int wid, int bid, int ll)
      This constructor allows you to set the id and background id.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        public Block()
        This constructor sets all values to a default of 0. This makes it an air block.

      • Block

        public Block(int wid,
             int bid,
             int ll)
        This constructor allows you to set the id and background id. It also allows you to set lighting.
        Parameters:
        wid - world ID
        bid - block ID
        ll - light

      • Block

        public Block(int wid,
             Block_Water block)
        This constructor creates a block of a certain wid with the background and lighting of a water block.
        Parameters:
        wid - world id.
        block - the base water block.

      • Block

        public Block(int wid,
             Block block)
        This constructor creates a block of a certain wid with the background and lighting of another block.
        Parameters:
        wid - world id
        block - the base block.
